title: Implement strStr()
content:
Implement strStr().
Return the index of the first occurrence of needle in haystack, or  if  is not part of .
Clarification:
What should we return when  is an empty string? This is a great question to ask during an interview.
For the purpose of this problem, we will return 0 when  is an empty string. This is consistent to C's strstr() and Java's indexOf().
 




 



 and  consist of only lower-case English characters.
